Process.title: Period
Process.description: Steps of the Visa of Guest Investor and Sitting Permit Application Process

step1.title: Get a Consulting Appointment
step1.description: Get a consultancy appointment to get detailed information about the process and to evaluate your personal situation.

step2.title: Status Detection Controls are performed
step2.description: The history and financial status of the applicant are examined and the required documents are checked.

step3.title: Guest investor visa application is made
step3.description: Application is made for a guest investor visa and the investment commitment is officially declared.

step4.title: Travel to Hungary to complete the investment
step4.description: It is necessary to travel to Hungary to complete investment transactions and sign the necessary documents.

step5.title: Sitting Permit Application is made
step5.description: After the investment is completed, the residence permit application is made officially.

step6.title: Go to Hungary for biometric data
step6.description: To receive biometric data such as fingerprints and photographs, you need to go to Hungary again.

step7.title: APPROVED IN 1-2 MONTHS
step7.description: After the application is evaluated, the application is usually notified within 1-2 months.

step8.title: Sitting Permit Certificate is Given
step8.description: After the application is approved, the residence permit certificate is submitted to the applicant.

q1.question: What is the minimum investment amount for a guest investor visa?
q1.answer: The minimum investment amount for a guest investor visa is usually 250,000 euros.

q2.question: How long does the residence permit apply?
q2.answer: The first residence permit is usually given for 2 years.

q3.question: Can I bring my family members?
q3.answer: Yes, within the scope of the guest investor visa program, your spouse and your children under the age of 18 can get a residence permit with you.

q4.question: Which documents are required for the application?
q4.answer: The required documents include passport, birth certificate, marriage certificate (if any), judicial registration, health insurance, financial state declaration, bank account breakdowns and investment plan.

q5.question: How long should I stay in Hungary?
q5.answer: As a residence permit, the minimum duration in Hungary is 90 days a year.

q6.question: When can I withdraw my investment?
q6.answer: You cannot withdraw your investment before your residence permit expires.

q7.question: How long does the application process take?
q7.answer: When all documents are presented completely, the application process usually takes 3-4 months.

q8.question: Can I apply for Hungarian citizenship?
q8.answer: Yes, you can apply for Hungarian citizenship after 8 years of legal residence.

q9.question: Will I have the right to free movement in the Schengen region?
q9.answer: Yes, with a residence permit, you can travel in the Schengen area for up to 90 days without a visa in the Schengen region.

q10.question: What are the application fees?
q10.answer: Application fees are approximately 110 euros per person.

header.title: Glockey: The only authorized quantum partner in Türkiye
header.subtitle: Your solution partner specializing in residence programs through citizenship and investment

content.paragraph1: Glockey is proud to be the exclusive partner of Quantum, which provides comprehensive expertise to residence programs through citizenship and investment.
content.paragraph2: In addition, Glockey has played an important role in strengthening Turkish-Hungarian commercial relations over the years and encouraging cross-border investment and economic cooperation between the two countries.
content.paragraph3: Glokey, the only partner of Quantum in Türkiye, works in close cooperation with the clients who want to get a guest residence permit and provides end -to -end support throughout the process.

steps.title: How does Glockey work?
steps.step1: A comprehensive consultancy is made to understand your needs and goals.
steps.step2: All information is provided about the private investment program
steps.step3: Support is given in the collection and arrangement of the necessary documents
steps.step4: All steps in Türkiye are carried out smoothly
steps.step5: Transactions in Hungary are carried out with Quantum

VisionPreview.title: Our vision
VisionPreview.description: As Quantum Trade Limited, we aim to become a leader in the field of global investment and consultancy with transparency, reliability and sustainable growth principles.
VisionPreview.point1: To provide innovative and sustainable investment solutions to provide the highest value to our customers.
VisionPreview.point2: Making investment processes more efficient and accessible by using technology and financial innovations.
VisionPreview.point3: To create a reliable consultancy platform that allows our investors to achieve their goals safely.
VisionPreview.point4: To establish long -term collaborations with transparency, ethical values ​​and customer -oriented service approach.
VisionPreview.point5: To facilitate access to economic and social opportunities with special programs such as Hungary Investor Visa.
